(0, 1).description: You find yourself in a small forest clearing. Tall trees surround the area, their branches reaching towards the sky. Patches of wildflowers dot the ground, adding splashes of color to the lush green grass. To the east, you can make out a narrow path leading deeper into the woods.

(1, 1).description: You find yourself at the edge of a small, crystal-clear stream. The water gently bubbles over smooth stones, creating a soothing melody. Across the stream, you notice a peculiar sight: a large, ancient-looking tree with a glowing symbol etched into its bark. The symbol seems to pulse with a faint blue light. Dense foliage surrounds the area, with the path continuing to the east and west.
